entities.name: mr diggory
entities.description: Mr. Diggory is the one who claims to have seen an intruder in his yard. He describes the incident where he was ambushed by his dustbins.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is the one who asks Mr. Diggory about what happened to the intruder and takes notes on the incident.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is referred to as an intruder by Mr. Diggory's head.

entities.name: dustbins
entities.description: The dustbins are the ones that ambushed Mr. Diggory and made a lot of noise.

relationships.description: Mr. Diggory saw an intruder in his yard.
Mr. Weasley asked Mr. Diggory about the intruder.
Mad-Eye was with the please-men when they turned up.
